scripts.start: npm run build && time node dist/index.js
scripts.small-file: npm run download ; gzcat data/data.csv.gz | head -n 10000000 > data/data.csv
scripts.big-file: npm run download ; gzcat data/data.csv.gz | head -n 100000000 > data/data.csv
scripts.real-file: npm run download ; gzcat data/data.csv.gz > data/data.csv
